类 EntText

  • public class EntText
extends EntBase
    版本:
    V0.2 Entity Text of AutoCAD DXF file.
    作者:
    David Wu <809758521@qq.com>

    • 字段详细资料

      • EntityName

        public java.lang.String EntityName
        code 0 -Entity name.

      • ClassLabel

        public java.lang.String ClassLabel
        code 100 -Class Label.

      • SubClassLabel

        public java.lang.String SubClassLabel
        code 100 -Sub Class Label.

      • base_point

        public wPoint base_point
        code 10,20,30 -Text location (in WCS).

      • height

        public double height
        code 40 - Height.

      • text

        public java.lang.String text
        code 1 - Text value (the string itself).

      • rotang

        public double rotang
        code 50 - Rotation angle (optional; default = 0).

      • relxscale

        public double relxscale
        code 41 - Relative X scale factor. For fit-type text (optional; default = 1.0).

      • obliqueang

        public double obliqueang
        code 51 - Oblique angle (optional default = 0).

      • style

        public java.lang.String style
        code 7 - Text style name (optional; default = "STANDARD"). Set to style table reference.

      • textgenflags

        public int textgenflags
        code 71 - Text generation flags.
        • 2 = Text is backward (mirrored in X).
        • 4 = Text is upside down (mirrored in Y).

      • horzalignflags

        public int horzalignflags
        code 72 - Horizontal alignment (optional, default = 0). Integer codes (not bitcoded).
        • 0 = Left
        • 1 = Center
        • 2 = Right
        • 3 = Aligned (if vertical alignment = 0).
        • 4 = Middle (if vertical alignment = 0).
        • 5 = Fit (if vertical alignment = 0).
        See vertalignflags for clarification.

      • vertalignflags

        public int vertalignflags
        code 73 - Vertical alignment (optional, default = 0). Integer codes (not bitcoded)
        • 0 = Baseline
        • 1 = Bottom
        • 2 = Middle
        • 3 = Top
        See second_point for clarification.

      • second_point

        public wPoint second_point
        code 11,21,31 - Alignment point. Present only if 72 or 73 group is present and nonzero. If the justification is anything other than baseline/left (groups 72 and 73 both 0), group code 11, 21, and 31 specify the alignment point (or the second alignment point for Aligned or Fit). (In OCS).

      • thickness

        public double thickness
        code 39 - Thickness (optional; default = 0).

      • xExtrusionDirection

        public double xExtrusionDirection
        code 210,220,230 - Extrusion direction. Present if the extrusion direction is not parallel to the world Z axis.

      • yExtrusionDirection

        public double yExtrusionDirection

      • zExtrusionDirection

        public double zExtrusionDirection
